attributes.action: Death Penalty for Terrorists in Britain
attributes.additional_details: I think it is about time that the Government took a good look at Terrorism in this Country.  The terrorists should face the death penalty.  Hopefully after that tragic murder where a young soldier was brutally hacked to death might open their eyes.  Something has to be done.  Please sign the petition and let's get something done to prevent such awful and brutal attacks happening again.
